Reviews.Title: no more than a toy
Reviews.Author: Oscar G.
Reviews.Content: This is not a 1GB RAM tablet.  It has only  0.5GM RAM.  I ordered two of these as a Christmas gift for my grandkids,  I tested these 754TCPII prior to giving them away.  They will make a good present for kids.  This tablet is no more than a toy.

Reviews.Title: This is NOT a 1Gb RAM tablet
Reviews.Author: D. Ratcliffe
Reviews.Content: Beware. This tablet is NOT available in a 1Gb RAM version, only 512Mb. The description is incorrect. With memory that small there is precious little space for loading programs, which makes this tablet not much more than a plaything. DON'T expect to do much in the way of serious work with it.
